system.useTime: A Prepared host must be a living human whose body is agonisingly prepared. The human need not be willing.
system.novice: The Daemonhost produces a mind-breaking mist. Its attacks gain the Hallucinogenic (3) quality.

description.value: Novice: The Daemonhost produces a mind-breaking mist. Its attacks gain the Hallucinogenic (3) quality.
